Sentencas: A reversible solid oxide cell (rSOC) reactor can operate efficiently in both electrolysis mode and in fuel cell mode.
Titulo: Transient reversible solid oxide cell reactor operation - Experimentally validated modeling and analysis

Sentencas: The bidirectional operability enables rSOC reactors to play a central role as an efficient energy conversion system for energy storage and sector coupling for a renewable energy driven society.
Titulo: Transient reversible solid oxide cell reactor operation - Experimentally validated modeling and analysis

Sentencas: A combined system for electrolysis and fuel cell operation can result in complex system configurations that should be able to switch between the two modes as quickly as possible.
Titulo: Transient reversible solid oxide cell reactor operation - Experimentally validated modeling and analysis

Sentencas: This can lead to temperature profiles within the reactor that can potentially lead to the failure of the reactor and eventually the system.
Titulo: Transient reversible solid oxide cell reactor operation - Experimentally validated modeling and analysis

Sentencas: Hence, the behavior of the reactor during the mode switch should be analyzed and optimal transition strategies should be taken into account during the process system design stage.
Titulo: Transient reversible solid oxide cell reactor operation - Experimentally validated modeling and analysis

Sentencas: In this paper a one dimensional transient reversible solid oxide cell model was built and experimentally validated using a commercially available reactor.
Titulo: Transient reversible solid oxide cell reactor operation - Experimentally validated modeling and analysis

Sentencas: A simple hydrogen based system model was built employing the validated reactor model to study reactor behavior during the mode switch.
Titulo: Transient reversible solid oxide cell reactor operation - Experimentally validated modeling and analysis

Sentencas: The simple design leads to a system efficiency of 49% in fuel cell operation and 87% in electrolysis operation where the electrolysis process is slightly endothermic.
Titulo: Transient reversible solid oxide cell reactor operation - Experimentally validated modeling and analysis

Sentencas: Three transient operation strategies were studied.
Titulo: Transient reversible solid oxide cell reactor operation - Experimentally validated modeling and analysis

Sentencas: It is shown that the voltage response to transient operation is very fast, provided the reactant flows are changed equally fast.
Titulo: Transient reversible solid oxide cell reactor operation - Experimentally validated modeling and analysis

Sentencas: A possible solution to ensure a safe mode switch by controlling the reactant inlet temperatures is presented.
Titulo: Transient reversible solid oxide cell reactor operation - Experimentally validated modeling and analysis

Sentencas: By keeping the rate of change of reactant inlet temperatures five to ten times slower than the mode switch, a safe transition can be ensured.
Titulo: Transient reversible solid oxide cell reactor operation - Experimentally validated modeling and analysis
